The includes:

Buy WoT Azure Pegasus Event boost and participate in one of the most difficult events in the history of the game, reaching Legend Rank! Unlock unique event-only rewards, badges, dog-tags, and rarest camouflages for your tank.

What you will get

  • Legend Azure Pegasus rank reached
  • Various rewards from previous ranks obtained;
  • Heavenly Horse 2D Style for your tank on Legend rank, if the rank is kept until the end of the season;
  • Days of premium account, bonds, and other additional prizes.

Execution speed

Depending on what execution speed you choose, service can be completed faster.

  • Normal - you get a basic place in an Azure Pegasus boost completion queue;
  • Express - your order receives a higher priority, decreasing completion time by 30%;
  • Extra Express - your order gets the highest priority, making completion time as quick as possible.

FAQ

You can level your character only in dungeons, but in this case, you can miss out on a lot of useful unlocks, such as the new Dragonriding system. Also, quest leveling will help you to take the first steps in becoming Renown with Dragonflight factions, which also will be useful in the endgame.
